title: Swap It Out
lyrics:
[Chorus]
Open up to me, it's all you gotta do
Give me all your heart, I'll swap mine out with you
Swap it out with you, swap it out with you
You come into my world, I'll give my world to you
We can swap, swap, swap it out
[Verse 1]
I can show you what I'm talking 'bout
Be obliged just to show you how
Follow my lead, that's what you oughta do
No pressure
Swapping out ain't ever been a crime
If it was then I'd do the time
Throw away the keys as long as I'm here with you
Forever
[Pre-Chorus]
Eye for an eye
Remember when I told you
"Wipe your pretty eyes, dry 'em on my shoulder"?
You ain't gotta try, try to get closer
50/50 deal, let's make a deposit
Simulate the love, try it 'fore you knock it
You ain't gotta rush, but you ain't gotta stop it

[Chorus]
Open up to me, it's all you gotta do
Give me all your heart, I'll swap mine out with you
Swap it out with you, swap it out with you
You come into my world, I'll give my world to you
We can swap, swap, swap it out
[Verse 2]
Oh, swappin' out will only change your life
But it's worth it, the sacrifice
After all, what do we have to lose? Nothing
Don't separate our destiny
By separating you from me
These are the terms that were made for each other, woah, oh
[Pre-Chorus]
Ooh, 
eye for an eye
Remember when I told you
"Wipe your pretty eyes, dry 'em on my shoulder"?
You ain't gotta try, try to get closer
50/50 deal, let's make a deposit
Simulate the love, try it 'fore you knock it
You ain't gotta rush, but you ain't gotta stop it (You ain't gotta stop it)
[Chorus]
Open up to me, it's all you gotta do (It's all you gotta do)
Give me all your heart (Give me all your heart), I'll swap mine out with you (Right now)
Swap it out with you (Oh, right now), swap it out with you (Right now)
You come into my world (My world), I'll give my world to you
We can swap, swap, swap it out (Yeah, yeah, oh)

[Bridge]
Woah-oh-oh, we can swap out our love, uh
Don't be afraid, darling
I got your back, baby
Oh, you don't gotta worry, no
You gotta know that, baby
Open up to me
[Chorus]
Open up to me, it's all you gotta do (Open up to me)
Give me all your heart, I'll swap mine out with you (Swap it out)
Swap it out with you (Swap it out), swap it out with you (Swap it out)
You come into my world (Yeah), I'll give my world to you
We can swap, swap, swap it out (Woo-ooh-ooh)
[Outro]
We can swap out our love
Over and over and over again, yeah
Oh-oh, you ain't gotta be afraid
Oh, your love is in my hands
My hands, your love is in my hands
Oh-oh-oh, your love is in my hands
